tutorials.title: Lab 1: Setup Graphical Remote Desktop on Compute Instance
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to deploy and configure noVNC Graphical Remote Desktop on an Oracle Enterprise Linux (OEL) instance.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create Custom Compute Image for OCI Marketplace
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to prepare a host for custom image capture and create the custom image that meets stringent OCI marketplace requirements.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Publish Custom Compute Image to OCI Marketplace
tutorials.description: This lab will show you how to create an OCI marketplace compute based artifact from your custom image, and use it to create a private listing on marketplace exclusively dedicated to your LiveLabs workshop.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
